hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # once a day on the 1st and 15th of every month except December H H 1 7,10,1,4 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#cd /Library/WebServer/Documents/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
### this will generate 168.tar.gz php5.6 168.php jenkins
### this will generate 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz php5.6 resource_utility.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "168_meta_recoded", "task": "metadata_recoding"}'
#LAST STEP: copy last transactional DwCA to Bioimages.tar.gz OK
cd /html/eol_php_code/applications/content_server/resources cp 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz Bioimages.tar.gz ls -lt 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz ls -lt Bioimages.tar.gz rm -f 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz
